title: Chinese Mega-Brand XDS Buys into Astana Qazaqstan for Birth of New Super Team
content:
Bike manufacturing monolith XDS buys into Vinokourov's team for 'long term investment and significant changes.'

Read the full article at Chinese Mega-Brand XDS Buys into Astana Qazaqstan for Birth of New Super Team on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
